Body:
X, y = pyrecs.util.matrix_to_dataset(data)
expected_tuples = [(0, 0, 10), (0, 1, 3.4), (1, 0, 10), (1, 1, 0), (1, 2, 
    10), (1, 3, 5), (2, 1, 1.4), (2, 2, 10), (2, 3, 3), (3, 1, 8), (3, 2, 2
    ), (3, 3, 5)]
X_expect = [(r, c) for r, c, _ in expected_tuples]
y_expect = [v for _, _, v in expected_tuples]
assert X == X_expect
assert y == y_expect
pytest.mark.parametrize('data', [data, list_data])
